website_summaries.verdict: Rectangular and transparent, this mat grips well and gives your office chair a smooth surface for gliding.
pros: Works on Berber or higher pile carpets
Includes grips to help the mat stay in place
Very clear, making it less obvious in your space, allows you to still enjoy your flooring
cons: The edges of the mat can be a little sharp and are not rounded

customer_reviews.title: A piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my previous heavy duty chair mat, this is crap. Very thin and it appears that it is not durable. It has a tendency to move around and I am just using a chair at my desk. For heavy use, I cannot recommend the mat. There are better choices in the market place. I like the size of the mat, but that is it. By the way, the reason for the purchase, I have remodeled my office and it did not require a large chair mat. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Bonebox

customer_reviews.title: Useless on average height carpet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago, and despite many efforts to make it work, it just doesn't. The bottom just doesn't stick to average height carpet; it just slips around. I've tried rearranging furniture to put it against surfaces, but it still slips with any movement of a computer chair over it. I put books and weights on different sides and it still finds ways to slip. I consider it a deadweight loss at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. This mat is only about a 1/16" thick. Does no stay put and shifts all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Jricky

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly FIRM Mat
customer_reviews.text: This (30" x 48") chair mat perfectly fit my small work area and I couldn't be happier. It comes in a firm flat cardboard package, there was no curve to straighten out. Just opened the cardboard and laid it on the carpeting and that's it. My chair is a heavy gaming chair but it moves super easy on this relatively hard mat. It's perfect. I never knew my chair moved so easy 'til I put it on this mat. This is not one of those squishy mats you get at regular retail which I hated and returned. If your looking for good mat to sit on carpeting I don't think you can go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: DougInLA

customer_reviews.title: Marvelux chair mat
customer_reviews.text: I received this chair mat on time and in good condition. It is a harder plastic and so it was mailed in a large flat box, not rolled up. It is attractive and works out well on my low carpet. My desk chair glides easily over it and the mat does not slide on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but watch the edges
customer_reviews.text: Does alright for what it is. Very stiff though with a semi-sharp edge. Stubbed my foot against it within the first couple of hours after getting it. Would be a lot better if the edges were rounded or had a lip on them, but nothing a little sandpaper can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Apollo McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Didn't buy for office use...
customer_reviews.text: So, we have a new puppy and I was looking for something to put under his indoor cage to protect the carpet while we potty train. The hard protector works and is easy to mop any spots he misses on the puppy pads. Now that he has got a little bigger we have bought a second so we can expand his indoor cage giving him more room to roam when we're not home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already cracked - used for 1-1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it has already cracked after just a month and a half of daily use on a low-pile carpeted floor and a brand new light-weight office chair. My special needs son is an excellent product quality tester. Will not be buying another from here!
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: The chair mat I purchased was very nice. It is exactly the right size snd appears to be very sturdy. I would recommend it to everyone. I was pleased it was packaged flat so I didn't have to uncurl it before laying it down. Also, it was delivered when promised. GOOD JOB!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase, Will Buy More
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stop raving about this mat. The grip is great, the size works well, and my chair easily glides from one end of my desk to the other. The mat arrived in a huge, flat box that was absolutely flaw-free, meaning that the mat arrived in perfect condtion. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product at a great price!! We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: We really couldn't have expected a better product for what it does for the price it is exemplary! The pad is very sturdy and well-designed to stay in place on the carpet. Makes the use of a rolling chair very practical that otherwise I'm not carpet often times it is a pain. The pad is used by my wife as she is the one that use the rolling chair and it also perfectly fits the desk that she uses what an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan E. Kiser

customer_reviews.title: slides around too much
customer_reviews.text: As i roll my chair around on this large mat I'm surprised it moves around. I have to completely move the mat everyother day because it gets so out of position. It has some teeth on the back to keep it from moving but it moves around anyway. This mat is very durable. Ive rolled off the edge several times and it has not cracked at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Agnello

customer_reviews.title: Works OK,  Durability uncertain
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and I have no complaints. Next time I will buy the thicker one because we have a short pile carpet, and the plastic deforms somewhat when the chair is in one position for a few hours. with someone in the chair. Some of the mat makers have a recommended thickness for various types of pile. Next time I will buy a mat that that is one thickness greater than the manufacturer recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The mat is exactly as described. Sturdy construction, lays flat, no bending at all, no corners coming up. Was mailed flat as well. Looks very nice on the rug. Bit of a sparkle to it. But practically invisible. Studs grip well into our low pile rug. Does not move around at all. Perfect for what we wanted. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted but what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Working from home for a few months made me aware of the damage my cheap office chair was doing to my bedroom / office carpet. This mat was supposed to prevent this but I may have gone too cheap. The nonslip bumps on the underside do not keep this from sliding on the medium pile carpet I have, and my 200lbs cause the mat to sink in and the edges to flex up if I step within a foot of the edge which makes this catch shoes or the casters of the chair. So as long as I sit still and step into the middle of this mat, it works well. And for what I paid, that is enough.
customer_reviews.author: StrongBadSmith

customer_reviews.title: WOULD BUY AGAIN BUT. , .
customer_reviews.text: Like the mat but it walks. Have low pile and bought the mat for low pile but wish it had longer “spikes.” I do wonder if the walking has anything to do with the fact that the rug it sits on is over wall to wall carpet. If so this would not be the fault of the product. I am pleased that as yet my chair has not made low spots where the chair rests.
customer_reviews.author: Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and don't dent
customer_reviews.text: these don't indent, and you don't find yourself always rolling into pre-dented hole. sturdy, and appears to be holding up very well. we own 4 in our home. some more than a year old now. we have a thin pile carpet 1/4" thick on 1/2" of padding. purchased the mat for low/standard pile. they do walk with the pile in our carpet (my only complaint) I usually end up against the legs of my desk, a slight nuisance but not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: sprintcarr

customer_reviews.title: Long term use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat because I needed a new one for my home office. I found that the price of these mats have drastically increased over the past 10 years, but never the less needed a new one. I like the size of this mat, as it is perfect for my office space. I gave 4 stars because the thickness of this mat is less than I expected. I've just had it for about a month and so far I like it, but not sure about how it will hold up even in the next 5 years. I will definitely review again when I've had more time to use and see how it works over the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is awesome. I originally bought for my stairs due to pets but ended up placing it in my office at work under my desk because of its size. It’s very durable and sturdy. I can say that wholeheartedly as I even put it to the test. I needed to cut it down a few inches and attempted to use a small saw to cut through it and .... it just didn’t go through. There’s a huge cut in it now but it’s not stopping it from doing its thing.
customer_reviews.author: MemeC

customer_reviews.title: Tough bird
customer_reviews.text: The mat is very thick and super smooth to roll a chair on -- but, it creeps across the floor ALL THE TIME no matter which way it's oriented, or what furniture I try to block the movement with. It was sold as an unbreakable, no chip mat in March when I bought it, and I can see the cracks starting now in October same year. It's so thick and sturdy that when weight is applied (for example, when you sit in the chair on your fancy new mat, the edges tend to curl upward, so if you roll a wheel off the mat, you're toast, can't get back on the mat without picking up your chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Baucum

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed, cracked in less than 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and am often in front of the computer when not working, so I traditionally have to replace chair mats every 2-3 years. I purchased this one (and paid premium for it) with the idea that it would last much longer, but it ended up breaking much sooner than thinner and cheaper mats used on the same low pile carpet. It also has a tendency to slide around much easier than other mats, which required constant repositioning. Now this mat is noticeably thicker and less flexible, which is probably the reason for breaking so quickly, since it doesn't "give" as much as thinner mats. Disappointing, but a learning experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: My old chair mat finally fell apart, read all the reviews and selected the Marvelux mat for replacement, arrived yesterday, I opened it and it immediately went flat, no curling, haven't had it for long, but so far just as advertised and just perfect for my needs. I do have a commercial low pile carpet that it sits on, my chair rolls easily, mat does not move or dent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like a chair mat that moves then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mat for three months now and I have struggled with it moving around on my carpet. According to the description, this should not be happening. I have also tried many things to prevent this such as setting the feet of my desk above it and even a file cabinet. Nothing I have done has stopped thing from moving. You're better off putting an extra set of wheels on your office chair.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Great Thickness and Overall Size
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat size (30" X 48") which sets in front of my sewing machine table. I have a chair with wheels, and it rolls nicely on this mat. My carpeting is a medium pile, and you can tell from the first photo that the mat has moved a little (up the table legs a bit) - this is due to the rolling chair moving it around, I think. But it's nothing unmanageable. I wasn't able to find this mat size at any local office supply retailers, so I was glad to find it from Marvelux. I'm happy with it, overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great, long lasting value
customer_reviews.text: Great product, can take the wear and tear. While I like this mat ---- I have to add that it is not as sturdy as the one it replaces. It is made out of a thinner material and it moves on the carpet. I have to readjust the mat's position daily. The spikes are not as long as they were on the other mat that I bought years ago, so it moves on the carpet. For the price I paid for it I would like to have less inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgeporter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is not good for anyone who is heavy ( I'm 290 lbs). The end curl up as a roll across the mat. It also indents from wheels if I sit in the chair longer than 30 to 45 minutes. If you can afford it, buy a little more expensive one that's a little thicker. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Husband started working from home and needed this for obvious reasons. It arrived quickly. I love the fact that it was t rolled up because we didn't have to struggle to reshape it. Immediately began using it on medium thick carpet and now he can move his chair with ease. The size was perfect as well. It's pretty thick too, leading me to believe it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Chair mat for office chair
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is shipped flat so I didn't have to worry about curling issues. It's rectangle so there is plenty of room for my chair to move around without slipping off onto the carpet. It seems to stay in place and not shift around. It seems very sturdy and durable. I spend a lot of time in my office chair and I still don't see any pits or dents from my wheels. The product was well worth the price and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stardust14

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, hard, doesn't dent
customer_reviews.text: This mat is surprisingly thin, flexible and durable. The last one I had was squishy and dented because of the wheels on my chair. But this mat holds up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Started warping and cracking after 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for my work from home office for about 3 weeks total now and it has 2 cracks and is warping. This is not meant to last for sure. The pain is trying to ship this back since it came flat.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Great for a carpet mat but be careful unpacking.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s perfect for carpet and the price makes it especially so. Be warned though.. take heed to the unpacking warning. This large mat is rolled into a tube so it’s under a lot of pressure. If you undo the bindings without thinking; it will release and slap you across your face. There are warnings urging caution when unpacking but sadly I I did not heed those. I have not been slapped that hard since Catholic grade school!
customer_reviews.author: Al Mass

customer_reviews.title: Purrrrrfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my needs . I have a two guitar floor stand next to my desk in my home office my breaks through out thr day consist of rolling spinning around to grab and play one of my guitars as a means of break from screen time this works great roll back without running over cords etc and smoothly adjust my chairs position with ease 1 day of use and I an thrilled no issues with staying put etc love ir already very functional
customer_reviews.author: Floyd T. Turbo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would last a long time. Spent some good time reading all the reviews and doing my research. Went to staples and saw all their mats and I wasn't convince of their durability. I'd preferred the Bamboo mats but they also disappointed me. I love that this mat very clear so my new carpet shows off. It's also very thick and shiny. My chair doesn't sink in and it's smooth to move around. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my tween's room
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 36x48 to use under a desk in my 12 year old daughter's room. The small size was perfect, and it works fine with her rolling chair. It's in a corner and it stays in place just fine, but the desk is setting on top of it, so... My daughter is only about 80 pounds, so I'm not sure how well it would hold up with an adult.
customer_reviews.author: RedRedtheycallmeRed

customer_reviews.title: Good Mat, Seems Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just purchase the 46x60 Marvelux mat. It was fairly easy to put down and appears to be very sturdy. My chair moves easily on this surface and I don't notice any indentations in the surface. (I weigh 200 lb) It is more expensive than other options but I think it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dale J

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Mat !!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best desk Mat. I have a heavy duty chair that roll over it all the time and hasn't scratched cracked, etc. Very sturdy and fit awesome under my desk. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Started using yesterday-too late to return-fine until you step on outer edges.
customer_reviews.text: Stored in unused room until furn delivery yesterday. Had walked across it a few times when not being used. Put down in a different room and thought everything was fine. Pile is low and chair without mat made me feel the pile isn't the cause. As a new customer I wasn't sure of return policy but I'm a day too late. If i step 6" from the edge, the edge goes up into the air. I do weigh 200 but sure that isn't the cause. When in unused room, not sure if I ever stepped near the edge as I did not want to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid, shipped FLAT! :)
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I LOVE that this chair mat is shipped flat so I didn't have to fight to uncurl it! I've only had it a week, but so far there are no dents from my chair wheels and it grips the carpet so doesn't move. Kind of expensive for a piece of plastic, but they all are. lol
customer_reviews.author: Marie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mat! Very sturdy - though it arrived rolled, it went to a completely flat shape in no time. DO make sure you have help when releasing the ties when unrolling it! It expands very quickly and is stiff enough to hurt if you are not careful. The price is high, but the quality is worth it in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for a couple of years now
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time at my desk, and I have a history of destroying carpets in short time always sitting at my desk. My carpet is doing well years later and I write this sitting on top of that plastic cover still to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Just To Be Honest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat- for a different purpose. I wanted it as a lining for the floor under my kitchen sink. When I looked for sheets of plexiglass it is so expensive. A snip with my jig-saw and it now fits perfectly underneath my sink and easily cleaned if something spills. Yes I am going to buy it again because I think it would work nicely in the pots and pans cabinet also. :)
customer_reviews.author: SpunkyLady

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and have this in my home office, my other one started to crack after 2 yers. This one is so thin, I will be surprised if it lasts that long. it also doesn't lie flat, I have cut my foot on it now 4 times and only had it only a week.
customer_reviews.author: Babette

customer_reviews.title: Good product but expensive
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all, this product came nicely packed and was shipped flat. That was extremely important for me. 2nd, has a lot of grip on one side, which makes it perfect for carpet floors. Overall good product. But $20 would be the price to be honest. No more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Flat!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped flat! Rolled mats for use on carpets is not advisable. This is a hard clear plastic mat that is not rollable. It has a little give and chair casters may set into it a bit but the mat will save your carpet.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chair mat. It fits the space we have it in well, it looks nice in the room, it is comfortable to walk or stand on, and most importantly it does a good job of protecting our carpet from the wear and tear of our desk chairs (which is what we needed it for).
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Plexiglass fit perfect with my desk that I am using as a small computer room in my house. Now my chair will move around on the carpet underneath with the greatest of ease
customer_reviews.author: servmart

customer_reviews.title: Great floor cover for tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: This mat fits my space-constrained desk area very well, and provides a nice solid surface to protect the carpet underneath. The mat is rigid enough, and with "teeth" on the underside where it will hold firm on medium-pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Irish con carne

customer_reviews.title: This Product is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair mat in my home office on medium pile carpet and it is a great product. I was using a softer mat that my chair pitted where the coasters touched the mat. I had a physical workout just pushing and tugging on the chair to get it to roll! With this new mat my chair feels like it is rolling on air. I love this mat! It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann French

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty decent product, my only issue is i thought it would be bigger than what it is. It doesn't cover my whole carpet and i have to constantly move it to where my chair sits often. Which is probably my own fault for not knowing the sizes. Other than that it works very well and it's durable, have had it for a month or two at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son's room as he spends a lot of time gaming and his chair was ruining the new rug. The chair mat arrived quickly and was shipped flat. The size and shape fit perfectly on rug and under the desk (it's an old secretary desk) and the mat stays securely in place. The casters on chair roll over it smoothly. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chopper Copper

customer_reviews.title: Ships Flat!!  Ships Flat!!  Ships Flat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did I mention it ships flat? Very nice heavy duty mat. Purchased some prior to that came rolled up and they were nothing short of ridiculous. Would buy this again, but based on the quality it will be quite some time before that happens!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Matthews

customer_reviews.title: It works great at preventing the dirt and mud and such from ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as an entrance mat to my apartment since it is all carpeted floors... It works great at preventing the dirt and mud and such from getting onto the carpet... Also seems to be holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: illen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Simple packaging, mat arrived flat vs. rolled up. The width on this mat is one of the main reasons I purchased this. I recommend this if you have low profile carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ends curl upward when the weight is placed in the middle
customer_reviews.text: The sides curl upwards when weight from my roller chair and myself are in the middle. It is very easy to trip over. I thought it would tack down on the carpet but it doesn't. An accident waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: W. D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Arrives nice and flat!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are sturdy and nice and clear. They work well on carpet. I like that they come flat in a big box, so I didn’t have to fight unrolling them. I bought two for my sewing room rolling chairs.
customer_reviews.author: teach307

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am 275lbs and rough on everything I own. I have owned mine for 1.5 years and I am just now seeing a small crack. While I know the crack will only get bigger, I am pleased it lasted this long. $50 for 1.5 years - I am ok with that. It has been super study, which is a must for me. I am sure a normal weighted person will much longer than 1.5 years out of it. I will be buying the same one again right now.
customer_reviews.author: mark m.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know a mat would make such a pleasant, positive difference!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this mat. My old one was all cracked and rippled and I put up with it for so long. My chair just glides along the surface of this new mat and feels so much more substantial. I like the way the mat was shipped flat, so you didn't have to wait for it to uncurl. It is just a wonderful addition to my office.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite pleased with this chair mat, which replaced a similar one I had in place in my home office for almost 20 years. It is a very good weight, solid construction and works flawlessly. I had read reviews of several other, less expensive mats and am happy that I paid a little more for this one as it had none of the problems/flaws cited in reviews of similar products from other manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This mat works very well. I have it several weeks before writing my review to ensure it performed well. Grips the low pile rug nicely and doesn’t slip. The chair wheels don’t dent the plastic like other chair mats I’ve used. This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I need a chair mat to use on a plush, braided rug, and this is just the thing! Part of my mat dies extend onto the hardwood floor under my desk, and since no one makes a combination hardwood/carpet mat, I just use a carpet scrap over the hardwood floor to prevent the mat from scratching.
customer_reviews.author: allisongot

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: It is not an effective mat. I have a normal size chair and I constantly roll off the end. Plus the mat slips along the carpet so it’s always out of place. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slides all over the place.
customer_reviews.text: This thing will move six inches in a day. I don't know why. It's got fairly large grippers and I don't move all that much. Other than that it's great. I just re position it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good mat don't hold up well with my extra wt.
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat but I wish they made them a little thicker. They fall apart after about 9mo. It will get heavy use and I'm about 240lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT Under My Desk.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect shape and size for under my desk. Most of these are square with a protruding piece that goes under the desk (not practical it seems). This one is a great average-size fit for desks, and it does not "travel" on the carpet much when moving my chair. Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Kittytreets

customer_reviews.title: Protects carpet in my home office
customer_reviews.text: Provides a solid surface for my wheeled office chair and is very durable. Compact size is convenient. No plastic smell, and since this is a flat harder plastic, there are no issues with the mat rolling up at the ends or rut formation. Would certainly it buy again!
customer_reviews.author: brendan karanasios

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I received the mat about 2 weeks ago and it has worked out well. I like that it fits and it not too wide. It came packaged flat which was a plus and with fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good for protecting your carpet
customer_reviews.text: This is good to protect my carpet, but it does slide around a bit more than I would like. I'm not sure that the alternative of a more sticky bottom would be better, so it definitely does what I purchased it to do.
customer_reviews.author: ion goiman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pad
customer_reviews.text: This pad is thick and durable in comparison to th one I purchased at a local office supply store. My chair doesn’t sink in the carpet which I appreciate since I work from home and sit for 10 hrs talking on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: DiMuley

customer_reviews.title: A good chair mat
customer_reviews.text: The size and construction of the mat are as advertised. It is not as thick as I thought it would be, so durability will be determined after protracted use.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I disagree with reviews that said it didn't stay in place. It stays put well on medium height carpet. We weigh between 170 and 210 and there is no problem. Perhaps the people who had issues weighed more? Just guessing.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I like the flexibility and it seems to stay put on the carpet fairly well. The size is perfect and would defiitely purchase this again or recommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: Marie Baars

customer_reviews.title: wont stay put
customer_reviews.text: Poor design, rolling on it is bumpy. Get a different one, not sure why the reviews are so high on this item.
customer_reviews.author: R. House

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap product and not as described
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk! Flimsy product and definitely not as described. Tried it once for a home office chair on very low pile carpet and the flimsy plastic buckled and made it virtually impossible to move the chair comfortably. I would in no way recommend this product. In fact it’s going back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: David Duet

customer_reviews.title: Quality of mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought a previous one from Staples that the plastic was harder and it cracked when the chair rolled on it. This has flexibility and is working great
customer_reviews.author: Patty R

customer_reviews.title: A-
customer_reviews.text: You might or might not stub your toes, in my case it only happened once, slightly hence why I give it an A- but still not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxx T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chair Mat
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! Chair mat is thick and has grippers. It works wonderful on my carpet. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great chair mat for my home office. It arrived flat as described. My carpet is standard pile and I do have to re-position the mat every few weeks as it moves a little over time. But this has not been a big issue for me. Overall the mat looks great, my chair moves easily and there are no cracks!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Moving bottom with moving chair
customer_reviews.text: It has teeth on the bottom of the mat for the carpet. But, the teeth cannot bite the carpet well. Whenever I move my chair, the pad moves together. When I try to move the pad to the original position, now the teeth works and very difficult to put it back. What are these teeth for?
customer_reviews.author: Sang Joon Ahn

customer_reviews.title: Shipped flat good quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. Was shipped in a flat box which when removed from package laid flat immediately. Really like that. Didn’t have to try and flatten. Quality is very good. Loved the product. Good value for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this in my home office over a pile rug. It works and is easy to roll the chair wheels over it without meeting the resistance of the rug. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyGirl!

customer_reviews.title: Allows your roller chair to roll
customer_reviews.text: This chair mat is exactly what was described. It is a firm polymer so the wheels don't sink into the mat while sitting. Size is perfect for my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: J. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Been using for almost 2 weeks and no complaints. Great price and doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Ships flat.
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable, but it definitely flexes on standard carpet. Also the spikes are short enough that it moves around a little bit. Definitely shipped flat which is a huge benefit.
customer_reviews.author: David Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great chair mats
customer_reviews.text: We had the mats for 2 weeks and they work great. Chairs slide easily, new carpet is protected, and they are exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it long enough to comment about durability but will do so in a few months. CAUTION! Please read the instructions when opening and DO NOT do it around little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: So far am enjoying the Mat , nice to have it! no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: The mat seems very sturdy and durable. I ordered it for a supervisor and they were very happy with the quality. I would buy again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Marvelux
customer_reviews.text: They are fine, I put them on low and medium carpet for the chair to roll around by desk and computer.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Curling chair mat
customer_reviews.text: This chair mat started curling within months of my purchase but after the return date. I tried using heavy duty double sided tape but as you can see it still curls. I have now had to replace this mat after owning if for less than a year. I am now out of pocket $53 for this mat. I have had chair mats last 5 to 7 years in the past, not months! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Anastasiou

customer_reviews.title: Can be dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: The chair slipped across the matt and dumped me into the corner of my printer desk. Bled like a stuck pig. Day 5 the wound is a lot better. My fault? Maybe, but I threw the matt away!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made mat. It is sitting on top of a Berber carpet. No complaints so far!
customer_reviews.author: Popfizz7

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Clings to carpet just fine. Holds up my 230lb frame.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rosner Sr

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was more durable but it was a good purchase and it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my work. It is heavy duty and fits great. It is much nicer than the ones from the big box stores. I will buy these again for anyone in my office
customer_reviews.author: Bob Embrey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and tried to save money when I bought my second one and got a cheaper one. This is worth the money!!! The quality is great and it has held up beautifully!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Working very well in office space.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat for my office area. Received quickly. Easy to unbox and place in workspace (read label about the tension before cutting wrap). Flattens immediately. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BCH

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with my purchase of this floor mat. It fits where I want it, does not move once put down and so far has performed just as I expected and desired. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: grcake

customer_reviews.title: The product is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cover works great & saves wear & tear on our carpet. Easy to roll over, sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: SueLG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat a couple months ago for use in my home office, which is getting a lot of use right now. Unfortunately, this May has not held up. It doesn’t lay flat and has bent up around the outside as you can see in the photos. I’ve stubbed my toes and my kids have scraped their ankles on these. Don’t spend your money on this. I’m replacing with another product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was not looking for flexibility; I wanted carpet protection in my man cave. This product will do it for me. Large enough to keep me rolling between computer table and desk.without touching the carpet. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Marvelux Enhanced Polymer Eco-Friendly Office Chair Mat for Low and Standard Pile Carpeted Floors 36" x 48" | Rectangular Carpet Protector, Transparent | Shipped Flat | Multiple Sizes
feature_bullets: ENHANCED POLYMER CARPET CHAIR MAT FOR LIGHT/MEDIUM USE - 36" x 48" - Superior carpeted floor protection. Rectangle shape ideal for use under office desks. Suitable for low and standard pile carpets (up to 3/8" thick).

DURABLE SMOOTH SURFACE FOR ERGONOMIC GLIDING - Strong enhanced polymer chair mat with a smooth easy glide surface provides added ease of movement with rolling desk chairs, proven to reduce leg fatigue by taking the strain off your legs.

STUDDED BACK COMPUTER CHAIR MAT - Provides effective grip to keep the chair rug firmly in place whilst helping to prevent damage to low and standard pile carpets caused by rolling office chair wheels and casters.

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY MAT - Produced using up to 25% recycled polycarbonate and up to 30% renewable energy, this is the most durable Eco-friendly chair mat. No odor toxins, cadmium, tin or lead. Easy to clean with warm soapy water, no harsh chemicals required.
SHIPPED FLAT - Our small size chair mats (30" x 48" and 36" x 48") are shipped flat and our larger size chairmats (48" x 51" and 48" x 60") are shipped rolled.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars491 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
